name: Pirros
headline: Github for Construction
description: Engineers and Architects end up redesigning hundreds of details a year just because they are unable to search through all their past details. Pirros allows designers to effectively search all their past project details so that they can find quality starting points rather than redesigning from scratch.

founders.name: Ari Baranian, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO of Pirros. Previously led Software Development group at national structural engineering company.

founders.name: Peter Johann, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Pirros. Previously worked as a structural engineer in LA.

# It’s time to modernize your firm’s detail management
Pirros is a modern approach to detail management – analyzing the thousands of new details you design every year, and aggregating the right ones into a cloud-based library of details.
[Schedule a demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6549e777e2f2e8a845ff694b/654a3594f32c4b08adfc819e_button%20orange%20vector.svg)](http://pirros.io/</demo>)[Learn more](http://pirros.io/</features>)

## Your details have the potential to be your firm’s superpower
Only a fraction of information gets captured in your firm's detail library. Pirros unlocks all the information that you currently can only access by digging through past projects.
### Efficiency
Our advanced search engine allows you to search all the metadata associated with a detail to locate it in under a minute, then pull it into Revit just as quickly — no waiting for a model to open or upgrade.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6549e777e2f2e8a845ff694b/65528e7919243ebc726136e4_efficiency.webp)
### Knowledge
Before Pirros, only the most commonly-used details were considered worthy of storage in your firm’s in-house library. With Pirros, you can capture that _and_ all the knowledge that’s lost even in your most unique detailing conditions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6549e777e2f2e8a845ff694b/65528e9c25a93a52e3e0c44d_knowledge.webp)
### Management
Pirros streamlines building your detail library by analyzing past projects, providing insights on which details to vet and add to your library, and automating manual steps required to add and categorize details.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6549e777e2f2e8a845ff694b/65528ea9003426a18dfe109d_management.webp)
## Meet your firm’s in-house detail search engine
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654a1d7580dfa9c70ea7e51b/654bc15fa5649ec50c638dde_Search.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654a1d7580dfa9c70ea7e51b/654a3219a1383c80a2e461bd_search%20orange.svg)
### Search
Search for details based on the keywords or metadata associated with that detail or project.
[](http://pirros.io/</features/search-filter>)[](http://pirros.io/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654a1d7580dfa9c70ea7e51b/654bc17adf3d36f82db8fa89_Filter%203.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654a1d7580dfa9c70ea7e51b/654a327393da5abb6cf2feba_Filter%203.svg)
### Filter
Narrow your search based on any of your firm’s stored parameters that are automatically associated with your details, e.g. code cycle, location, client, construction type, etc.
[](http://pirros.io/</features/filter>)[](http://pirros.io/<https:/www.pirros.com/features/search-filter>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654a1d7580dfa9c70ea7e51b/654e4b31e62d1ac2337a77a6_Arrow%20-%20Right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654a1d7580dfa9c70ea7e51b/654a3283dedb324f7d4014c6_Arrow%20-%20Right.svg)

Move details between Pirros and Revit for a seamless design experience.

## FAQs
Check out some of our recently asked questions.
### Does Pirros provide details or just hosts our own details?
Pirros is a platform that hosts your firms details. Every firm has their own standards and way of doing things, and it's not our place to tell you which one is right or wrong. In addition, your firm likely designs 1000s of new details every year, so you would be surprised how many different detailing conditions your firm has already encountered.
### If we upload our information to your website, do other firms have access to it?
No. All your data is your proprietary information and your firm retains full ownership of it. Nobody outside of your firm has access to any of your information, and if you want to discontinue your subscription, we can delete all your data off our servers.
### Our firm already has a good detail library, do we need this?
Yes! Detail management doesn't stop once you build out your detail library. New details are constantly being created and existing details are constantly being updated and modified. If your firm has an elaborate in house detail library, it's probably because they recognize the value of good detail management. And the more a firm values detail management, the more they benefit from having the #1 detail management platform in the industry.
### If we sign up for your software, do you provide training?
Yes! We provide company wide training when your firm signs up. We also provide continuous customer support so if any of your AEs have questions, we will be sure to answer them immediately.

## Your details have the potential to be your firm’s superpower
Only a fraction of information gets captured in your firm's detail library. Pirros unlocks all the information that you currently can only access by digging through past projects.
### Efficiency
Our advanced search engine allows you to search all the metadata associated with a detail to locate it in under a minute, then pull it into Revit just as quickly — no waiting for a model to open or upgrade.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6549e777e2f2e8a845ff694b/65528e7919243ebc726136e4_efficiency.webp)
### Knowledge
Before Pirros, only the most commonly-used details were considered worthy of storage in your firm’s in-house library. With Pirros, you can capture that _and_ all the knowledge that’s lost even in your most unique detailing conditions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6549e777e2f2e8a845ff694b/65528e9c25a93a52e3e0c44d_knowledge.webp)
### Management
Pirros streamlines building your detail library by analyzing past projects, providing insights on which details to vet and add to your library, and automating manual steps required to add and categorize details.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6549e777e2f2e8a845ff694b/65528ea9003426a18dfe109d_management.webp)

## FAQs
Check out some of our recently asked questions.
### Does Pirros provide details or just hosts our own details?
Pirros is a platform that hosts your firms details. Every firm has their own standards and way of doing things, and it's not our place to tell you which one is right or wrong. In addition, your firm likely designs 1000s of new details every year, so you would be surprised how many different detailing conditions your firm has already encountered.
### If we upload our information to your website, do other firms have access to it?
No. All your data is your proprietary information and your firm retains full ownership of it. Nobody outside of your firm has access to any of your information, and if you want to discontinue your subscription, we can delete all your data off our servers.
### Our firm already has a good detail library, do we need this?
Yes! Detail management doesn't stop once you build out your detail library. New details are constantly being created and existing details are constantly being updated and modified. If your firm has an elaborate in house detail library, it's probably because they recognize the value of good detail management. And the more a firm values detail management, the more they benefit from having the #1 detail management platform in the industry.
### If we sign up for your software, do you provide training?
Yes! We provide company wide training when your firm signs up. We also provide continuous customer support so if any of your AEs have questions, we will be sure to answer them immediately. 
## Get your details closer to design-ready than they’ve ever been
Spend less time fussing with details, and more time designing with Pirros.

**Company Overview: Pirros**

Founded in 2022 and currently part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Pirros is on a mission to become the "GitHub for Construction." Based in Los Angeles, CA, this innovative startup consists of a tightly-knit team of 11 employees led by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. 

The challenge Pirros aims to solve is one that many engineers and architects face: the overwhelming difficulty of sifting through past project details. Before Pirros, countless hours were spent redesigning elements because past data was difficult to find. With Pirros, designers can effectively locate quality starting points from their extensive archives, eliminating redundancy and inefficiency.

### What Pirros Offers

Pirros offers a modern detail management platform that analyzes thousands of designs each year and collates them into a cloud-based library. Here’s a brief look at its core functionalities:

1. **Advanced Search & Filter**: Users can quickly search through metadata associated with details or projects to find what they need in under a minute.
2. **Revit Integration**: The platform syncs seamlessly with Revit—allowing details to flow smoothly between databases without lengthy model loading times.
3. **Organize & Collaborate**: Teams can collaborate effortlessly by grouping details together for easy viewing and sharing.
4. **Data Tracking & Detail Vetting**: Pirros provides insights on which details are most sought after, effective for standardizing and vetting processes.

### Benefits

- **Efficiency**: Dramatically reduces the time taken to locate and implement details across projects.
- **Knowledge Management**: Expands what firms can store by capturing niche details that may previously have been overlooked.
- **Strategic Asset**: Positions detail management as a fundamental aspect of business growth rather than a mere administrative overhead.

### Client Impact

Clients have reported transformative impacts on their workflow. Martin Lehr, Principal at CBA, stated, "Our launch has gone very well and people are loving the platform."
